Data generalisations:
Specific surveys carried out during this period include Phase 1 Habitat, Road Verge, Ramsey Estuary, Ayres Pitfall, LSG Exotics, Calf of Man Sublittoral Survey.  Data also comes from several  collections such as lizards and moths and casual records.
The majority of records have a full date.
Information withheld: Please refer to the websites of the three main partner organistions: Manx Wildlife Trust http://www.manxwt.org.uk/; Manx National Heritage http://www.manxnationalheritage.im/; Department of Environment, Food and Agriculture https://www.gov.im/about-the-government/departments/environment-food-and-agriculture/wildlife/.  See also  http://www.manxbiodiversity.org/
